status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75jnm","text":"To purify GFP-tagged ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5u3h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8c548","text":"BNIP3-GFP (available from Addgene) or BNIP3(W18A/L21A)-GFP (ΔLIR) (available from Addgene), ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"deics","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27i7b","text":"we purchase the gene-synthesized codon-optimized cytosol-exposed domain of BNIP3 (1-158aa) fused to a C-terminal GFP-tag in a pFastBac-Dual vector from Genscript (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddon9","text":"Introduce the point mutants by in vitro mutagenesis to generate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fop5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t7se","text":"BNIP3 W18A/L21A (ΔLIR) (available from Addgene). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7od07","text":"The constructs are used to generate bacmid DNA, using the Bac-to-Bac system, by amplification in DH10BacY cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f050t","text":"After verifying the bacmid DNA by PCR for insertion of the transgene, we purifiy bacmid DNA for transfection into Sf9 insect cells (12659017, Thermo Fisher, RRID:CVCL_0549). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3s4m8","text":"To this end, we mix   of plasmid DNA with FuGene transfection reagent (Promega) and transfect 1 million Sf9 cells seeded in a 6 well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2500","error":false,"guid":"0CBF526128A411EFB73A0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9l3i8","text":"About 7 days after transfection, harvest the V0 virus and used to infect 40 ml of 1 million cells per ml of Sf9 cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ku34","text":"Closely monitor the viability of the cultures and upon the decrease in viability and confirmation of yellow fluorescence, we collects the supernatant after centrifugation and store this as V1 virus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kqjv","text":"For expressions, we infect 1 L of Sf9 cells, at 1 million cells per ml, with 1 ml of V1 virus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27kqh","text":"When the viability of the cells decreases to 90-95%, collect the cells by centrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51iq2","text":"Wash the cell pellets with 1x PBS and flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93orc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cgvu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1heqg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":21}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c6igt","text":"Store the pellets at  . ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ebt5","text":"For purification of BNIP3-GFP wild-type or mutants, resuspend the pellets in 25 ml lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiog8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51k59","text":"Lysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r9nb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"200oo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jgfm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","10_0":"","10_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","9_0":"","9_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["365",100],"data":[["Tris-HCl","50 mM"],["pH ","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["glycerol","5%"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2mM"],["benzonase (Sigma)","1 µl"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""]],"guid":"8EA7E7F0142F4A389837BA91C13D33DC","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl","50 mM"],["pH ","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["glycerol","5%"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2mM"],["benzonase (Sigma)","1 µl"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
